Plot Concept Lattice

Source: R/lattice_plot.R
lattice_plot.Rd

Visualization of the concept lattice using 'ggraph'.

Usage

lattice_plot(
  nodes_df,
  cover_matrix,
  method = "sugiyama",
  mode = NULL,
  objects = NULL,
  attributes = NULL,
  object_names = TRUE,
  to_latex = FALSE,
  extents = NULL,
  intents = NULL,
  ...
)

Arguments

nodes_df

Data frame with 'id'.

cover_matrix

Sparse matrix.

method

Layout method ("sugiyama", "force").

mode

Labeling mode ("reduced", "full", "empty").

objects

Character vector.

attributes

Character vector.

object_names

Logical (Deprecated).

to_latex

Logical.

extents

List of extents.

intents

List of intents.

...

Extra args.
